dict.string: This is a picture of the 3D virtual elements created by an AR phone application. I cannot see them; help me understand what's around me. Give me a description of the 3D elements of the image as it was their alt text. Answer with only a description of the foreground

This is a picture of the environment around me taken from an AR application. The image contains real objects and virtual ones. I cannot see them; describe what's in the environment and the relationships between objects. Just describe what's around me as it was the alt text of the image. Answer with the description only

This is a picture of the environment around me. I cannot see it. Describe what's in the environment and the relationships between objects. Give me a description in the form of an alt text for the image. Provide me with enough information and details to navigate the environment. Answer with the description only

array.string: This is a picture of the environment around me taken from an AR application. The image contains real objects and virtual ones. I cannot see them; what's in the foreground? Give me a description in the form of an alt text for the image foreground. Answer with the description only

This is a picture of the environment around me taken from an AR application. The image contains real objects and virtual ones. I cannot see them; what's in the background? Give me a description in the form of an alt text for the image background. Answer with the description only
Is there any obstacle on my path?

This is a picture of the environment around me taken from an AR application. The image contains real objects and virtual ones. I cannot see them; is there any significant obstacle on my path? Briefly describe detected obstacles

This is a picture of the environment around me. I cannot see it. What's the color of the object framed by a white transparent box? Answer with the color only or, if it is multicolored, with a brief description focused on its colors. If you cannot find the object framed by a white transparent box answer with "The object you selected is not visible on screen"
Where's this object relative to another?

This is a picture of the environment around me. I cannot see it. There are two objects framed by two white boxes. How's the first positioned relative to the other? Answer with the description only, in an alt text style. Do not mention the white frame. If you cannot find one or both objects answer with "The objects you selected are not visible on screen"
